actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to authorize the Secretary to provide epileptics medicine for the treatment of epilepsy.

summary.text: Authorizes appropriations to the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare for fiscal year 1975 to provide medicine to epileptics for the treatment of epilepsy.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to authorize the Secretary to provide epileptics medicine for the treatment of epilepsy.
